name: Red Tiki
description:
Red Tiki is a team of 'Creative Coconuts' working together for the love of the web. We’ve been making successful, internationally award winning websites for over a decade. We love what we do & it shows in our work. 
We don’t believe in sales people or outsourcing. The only people you deal with are those who will be managing & doing your work. 
Every one of our team is experienced in digital design, well educated & has been hand picked because they’re the best at what they do.
We're passionate about making & keeping the web beautiful & understand how best to make it work for you. 
 
READ MORE...
